title: Greenmarket at Oculus Plaza
location: Church at Fulton Street, on Oculus Plaza
seo_title: Greenmarket at the Oculus returns to downtown Manhattan
short_description: GrowNYC announces the return of the downtown farmers market- Greenmarket at Oculus Plaza
more_content: The Greenmarket at Oculus Plaza will be open every Tuesday from 7:00 am - 7:00 pm until November 28, 2017. Please visit Westfield and GrowNYC for more information about vendors, happenings and more.
seo_description: GrowNYC returns to the World Trade Center area with the Greenmarket at Oculus Plaza
